text:
@NC_Governor Cooper is using COVID19 as an excuse to cancel the event.
As a Medical professional I can tell you, COVID19 is gone, no where to be found in NYC, hospitals are empty. Politicians cont this narrative for a political reason. @realDonaldTrump @SebGorka @Lrihendry @DonaldJTrumpJr
